message: Let's split fairly, I'll take a bit more
I think we should split more evenly. This offer will benefit both of us in the long run.
I'll give you a bit less, but still more than my initial offer to you.
Alice, let's be reasonable.  The value is decreasing with each round. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit.
I'll meet you closer to the middle, but I still think I deserve a bit more.
